item.title: Happy Holidays from all the Bears

item.description: Happy Holidays and Merry Christmas from all the Bears
item.content:encoded: Happy Holidays and Merry Christmas from all the Bears

item.title: There’s a World Outside Your Window…
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: …and it’s a world of dread and fear. May it stay outside your window next year and beyond.
item.content:encoded:
…and it’s a world of dread and fear.

May it stay outside your window next year and beyond.

item.title: Programming Note
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Ken Houghton We’re off for two weeks in a foreign country, and internet access may be limited in the Great State of New Jersey, so—just in case in can’t find a way to pity sadly the University of Chicago’s Business School curriculum (yes, there’s an is-McMegan-is-being-obtuse-or-is-she-stupid post someone has to write; I’ll trust that someone […]
item.content:encoded:
Ken Houghton

We’re off for two weeks in a foreign country, and internet access may be limited in the Great State of New Jersey, so—just in case in can’t find a way to pity sadly the University of Chicago’s Business School curriculum (yes, there’s an is-McMegan-is-being-obtuse-or-is-she-stupid post someone has to write; I’ll trust that someone will)—Happy Hanukkah, Xmas, Kwanzaa, New Year’s, and all that.

Back by Twelfth Night. Have fun storming the castle.
